content: तिर्यच् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (तिरश्ची {%<ab>f.</ab>%}, rarely तिर्यं, ची) {@--1@} Oblique, transverse, horizontal, awry; <ls>Ku. 6. 71.</ls> {@--2@} Crooked, curved. {@--3@} Crossing over, traversing. {@--4@} Winding. {@--5@} Lying in the middle or between. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} , {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} An animal (going horizontally, as distinguished from man who walks erect), a lower or irrational animal; बंधाय दिव्ये न तिरश्चि कश्चित् पाशादिरासादितपौरुषः स्यात् <ls>N. 3. 20</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 48.</ls> {@--2@} A bird. {@--3@} (With Jainas) The organic world, or plants.
